name: Street Fighter ~ Scratch Edition
description:
P1 Controls:

A, W, S, D for walking, crouching and jumping and for selecting your character. Press F to choose character when on the select screen.

P1 Basics:

Light Punch: F
Heavy Punch: G
Light Kick: C
Heavy Kick: V

--------------------------------------------------------------------

P2 Controls:

Arrow Keys to walk, crouch and jump and to select characters. Press O on the select screen to choose your character.

P2 Basics:

Light Punch: O
Heavy Punch: P
Light Kick: K
Heavy Kick: L
